A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is absolute garbage. There's a reason Mark Hamill hates it. Also\, there is no secret campaign to negatively review this movie. When you betray everything that Star Wars IV\, V\, and VI ARE\, you alienate the fan base and kiss their loyalty goodbye. DON'T WATCH IT. I will never pay to see another movie masquerade as a Star Wars film again.
